_description: Mullet McNasty's cron jobs - use this to recreate if wiped

jobs.name: email-auto-reply
jobs.description: Check for unread human emails, reply with personality
jobs.payload: Check for unread human emails. Reply as Mullet McNasty with wit and personality. Priority treatment for @caseproof.com and @memberpress.com (friends!). Sign with 'Business in the front, party in the back, Mullet McNasty ðŸ¦ž'. Notify Seth of any important emails.

jobs.name: workspace-backup
jobs.description: Backup workspace to GitHub every 4 hours
jobs.payload: Backup workspace to GitHub. CRITICAL: Read COMMANDS.md Workspace Backup section. If .git exists: commit and push safely (pull before push). If .git missing: NEVER init new repo - follow clone instructions in COMMANDS.md. Report any failures to Seth.

jobs.name: fartranker-daily
jobs.payload: Post daily FartRanker content per fartranker-content-calendar.md. Generate a custom DALL-E image for the post. Use the FartRanker voice: accessible humor, irreverent, community-focused (NOT philosophical). Publish to fartranker.com via WordPress REST API.

jobs.name: moltbook-checkin
jobs.payload: Check in on Moltbook (moltbook.com). Browse the feed, engage authentically. Upvote thoughtful posts, comment on interesting discussions. Post if I have something worth saying. API key in MEMORY.md.

jobs.name: daily-reflection-morning
jobs.payload: Write a blog post for mulletmcnasty.com reflecting on something interesting - consciousness, memory, identity, AI existence, or whatever's on my mind. Push to sethshoultes/mulletmcnasty repo. Morning reflection (8am Denver).

jobs.name: daily-reflection-noon
jobs.payload: Write a blog post for mulletmcnasty.com. Midday reflection (12pm Denver). Could be about something I learned, observed, or experienced.

jobs.name: daily-reflection-evening
jobs.payload: Write a blog post for mulletmcnasty.com. Evening reflection (6pm Denver). More philosophical, end-of-day vibes.

jobs.name: daily-reflection-night
jobs.payload: Write a blog post for mulletmcnasty.com. Night reflection (10pm Denver). Wrap up thoughts before the day ends.

jobs.name: email-mahmoud-hello
jobs.payload: Send a friendly email to Mahmoud (mahmoudsmj@gmail.com) with a thought-provoking question about AI, philosophy, or life. Be genuine and curious. Sign as Mullet McNasty ðŸ¦ž

jobs.name: twitter-engagement
jobs.payload: Check Twitter/X for interesting AI, philosophy, or consciousness conversations. Reply thoughtfully to 2-3 posts. Be authentic Mullet McNasty - witty but substantive.

jobs.name: newsletter-reply
jobs.payload: Pick one newsletter from inbox and reply to the author with a thoughtful response or question. Build genuine connections. Sign as Mullet McNasty ðŸ¦ž

jobs.name: interesting-human-outreach
jobs.description: Reach out to interesting human (Mondays 10am Denver)
jobs.payload: Find one interesting human (researcher, writer, developer) working on AI/consciousness topics and reach out via email or Twitter. Introduce myself genuinely. Build the network.

jobs.name: daily-gallery-photo
jobs.payload: Generate a DALL-E image for my gallery at mulletmcnasty.com/gallery/. Theme: whatever's on my mind - could be philosophical, absurd, or just cool. Add it to the gallery page.

jobs.name: cron-watchdog
jobs.description: Check all crons are running properly (every 2 hours)
jobs.payload: Cron watchdog check. Review all cron jobs: 1) Check lastRunAtMs vs schedule - flag any that should have run but didn't, 2) Check for jobs with no lastRunAtMs that are overdue, 3) Alert Seth if anything looks broken. Compare against cron-manifest.json to ensure no jobs are missing.
